qas.question: In what year did News International begin producing The Times in both broadsheet in tabloid sizes?
When The Times began producing its newpaper in both broadsheet and tabloid sizes, which region did The Times withdraw its broadsheet from sale?
The Times is printed solely in what format since 2004?

context: In November <a0_0>2003<a0_0/>, News International began producing the newspaper in both broadsheet and tabloid sizes. On 13 September 2004, the weekday broadsheet was withdrawn from sale in <a1_0>Northern Ireland<a1_0/>. Since 1 November 2004, the paper has been printed solely in <a2_0>tabloid format<a2_0/>.
